document.full_text: the syrian army deployed overnight in the flashpoint city of homs, witnesses said, ahead of friday prayers that have been marked by intensifying protests in the last five weeks against authoritarian rule.
document.title: prayers test syria's assad's response to protests
lines_and_colors: the syrian army deployed overnight in the flashpoint city of homs, witnesses said, ahead of friday prayers that have been marked by intensifying protests in the last five weeks against authoritarian rule.
